summary: This is an internal email from a US Attorney's Office (likely SDNY) regarding an upcoming meeting with Brad Weinshiemer about the Epstein case. The sender requests an update memo on the status of the case, actions taken since the last update, and next steps, specifying it is for internal use only.

persons.name: Brad Weinshiemer
persons.context: The email states the sender is going to meet with Brad Weinshiemer on Monday, and requests an update memo on the Epstein case for this meeting.

events.title: Scheduled meeting with Brad Weinshiemer
events.description: A meeting is scheduled for Monday (the Monday after the email date of April 26, 2019) between the email sender and Brad Weinshiemer to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: The email is from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), indicating active federal prosecution work on the Epstein case as of April 2019.
The email requests preparation of an internal update memo detailing the case's status, recent actions, and next steps, specifically for a meeting with Brad Weinshiemer.
The memo is explicitly not intended for distribution to Washington D.C. (DOJ headquarters), suggesting it is for local/internal case management.
